00046 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00047 // Name: class CMultiAnimAllocateHierarchy
00048 // Desc: Inheriting from ID3DXAllocateHierarchy, this class handles the
00049 //       allocation and release of the memory used by animation frames and
00050 //       meshes.  Applications derive their own version of this class so
00051 //       that they can customize the behavior of allocation and release.
00052 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00053 class CMultiAnimAllocateHierarchy : public ID3DXAllocateHierarchy
00054 {
00055     // callback to create a D3DXFRAME-derived object and initialize it
00056     STDMETHOD( CreateFrame )( THIS_ LPCSTR Name, LPD3DXFRAME *ppNewFrame );
00057     // callback to create a D3DXMESHCONTAINER-derived object and initialize it
00058     STDMETHOD( CreateMeshContainer )( THIS_ LPCSTR Name, CONST D3DXMESHDATA * pMeshData,
00059                             CONST D3DXMATERIAL * pMaterials, CONST D3DXEFFECTINSTANCE * pEffectInstances,
00060                             DWORD NumMaterials, CONST DWORD * pAdjacency, LPD3DXSKININFO pSkinInfo,
00061                             LPD3DXMESHCONTAINER * ppNewMeshContainer );
00062     // callback to release a D3DXFRAME-derived object
00063     STDMETHOD( DestroyFrame )( THIS_ LPD3DXFRAME pFrameToFree );
00064     // callback to release a D3DXMESHCONTAINER-derived object
00065     STDMETHOD( DestroyMeshContainer )( THIS_ LPD3DXMESHCONTAINER pMeshContainerToFree );
00066 
00067 public:
00068     CMultiAnimAllocateHierarchy();
00069 
00070     // Setup method
00071     STDMETHOD( SetMA )( THIS_ CMultiAnim *pMA );
00072 
00073 private:
00074     CMultiAnim* m_pMA;
00075 };

00080 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00081 // Name: struct MultiAnimFrame
00082 // Desc: Inherits from D3DXFRAME.  This represents an animation frame, or
00083 //       bone.
00084 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00085 struct MultiAnimFrame : public D3DXFRAME
00086 {
00087 };
00088 
00089 
00090 
00091 
00092 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00093 // Name: struct MultiAnimMC
00094 // Desc: Inherits from D3DXMESHCONTAINER.  This represents a mesh object
00095 //       that gets its vertices blended and rendered based on the frame
00096 //       information in its hierarchy.
00097 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00098 struct MultiAnimMC : public D3DXMESHCONTAINER
00099 {
00100     LPDIRECT3DTEXTURE9* m_apTextures;
00101     LPD3DXMESH m_pWorkingMesh;
00102     D3DXMATRIX* m_amxBoneOffsets;  // Bone offset matrices retrieved from pSkinInfo
00103     D3DXMATRIX** m_apmxBonePointers;  // Provides index to bone matrix lookup
00104 
00105     DWORD m_dwNumPaletteEntries;
00106     DWORD m_dwMaxNumFaceInfls;
00107     DWORD m_dwNumAttrGroups;
00108     LPD3DXBUFFER m_pBufBoneCombos;
00109 
00110     HRESULT SetupBonePtrs( D3DXFRAME* pFrameRoot );
00111 };

00116 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00117 // Name: class CMultiAnim
00118 // Desc: This class encapsulates a mesh hierarchy (typically loaded from an
00119 //       .X file).  It has a list of CAnimInstance objects that all share
00120 //       the mesh hierarchy here, as well as using a copy of our animation
00121 //       controller.  CMultiAnim loads and keeps an effect object that it
00122 //       renders the meshes with.
00123 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00124 class CMultiAnim
00125 {
00126     friend class CMultiAnimAllocateHierarchy;
00127     friend class CAnimInstance;
00128     friend struct MultiAnimFrame;
00129     friend struct MultiAnimMC;
00130 
00131 protected:
00132 
00133     LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 m_pDevice;
00134 
00135     LPD3DXEFFECT m_pEffect;
00136     char* m_sTechnique;           // character rendering technique
00137     DWORD m_dwWorkingPaletteSize;
00138     D3DXMATRIX* m_amxWorkingPalette;
00139 
00140     std::vector <CAnimInstance*> m_v_pAnimInstances;     // must be at lesat 1; otherwise, clear all
00141 
00142     MultiAnimFrame* m_pFrameRoot;           // shared between all instances
00143     LPD3DXANIMATIONCONTROLLER m_pAC;                  // AC that all children clone from -- to clone clean, no keys
00144 
00145     // useful data an app can retrieve
00146     float m_fBoundingRadius;
00147 
00148 private:
00149 
00150     HRESULT             CreateInstance( CAnimInstance** ppAnimInstance );
00151     HRESULT             SetupBonePtrs( MultiAnimFrame* pFrame );
00152 
00153 public:
00154 
00155                         CMultiAnim();
00156     virtual             ~CMultiAnim();
00157 
00158     virtual HRESULT     Setup( LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9 pDevice, TCHAR sXFile[], TCHAR sFxFile[],
00159                                CMultiAnimAllocateHierarchy* pAH, LPD3DXLOADUSERDATA pLUD = NULL );
00160     virtual HRESULT     Cleanup( CMultiAnimAllocateHierarchy* pAH );
00161 
00162     LPDIRECT3DDEVICE9   GetDevice();
00163     LPD3DXEFFECT        GetEffect();
00164     DWORD               GetNumInstances();
00165     CAnimInstance* GetInstance( DWORD dwIdx );
00166     float               GetBoundingRadius();
00167 
00168     virtual HRESULT     CreateNewInstance( DWORD* pdwNewIdx );
00169 
00170     virtual void        SetTechnique( char* sTechnique );
00171 
00172     virtual HRESULT     Draw();
00173 };

00179 // Name: class CAnimInstance
00180 // Desc: Encapsulates an animation instance, with its own animation controller.
00181 //-----------------------------------------------------------------------------
00182 class CAnimInstance
00183 {
00184     friend class CMultiAnim;
00185 
00186 protected:
00187 
00188     CMultiAnim* m_pMultiAnim;
00189     D3DXMATRIX m_mxWorld;
00190     LPD3DXANIMATIONCONTROLLER m_pAC;
00191 
00192 private:
00193 
00194     virtual HRESULT Setup( LPD3DXANIMATIONCONTROLLER pAC );
00195     virtual void    UpdateFrames( MultiAnimFrame* pFrame, D3DXMATRIX* pmxBase );
00196     virtual void    DrawFrames( MultiAnimFrame* pFrame );
00197     virtual void    DrawMeshFrame( MultiAnimFrame* pFrame );
00198 
00199 public:
00200 
00201                     CAnimInstance( CMultiAnim* pMultiAnim );
00202     virtual         ~CAnimInstance();
00203 
00204     virtual void    Cleanup();
00205 
00206     CMultiAnim* GetMultiAnim();
00207     void            GetAnimController( LPD3DXANIMATIONCONTROLLER* ppAC );
00208 
00209     D3DXMATRIX      GetWorldTransform();
00210     void            SetWorldTransform( const D3DXMATRIX* pmxWorld );
00211 
00212     virtual HRESULT AdvanceTime( DOUBLE dTimeDelta, ID3DXAnimationCallbackHandler* pCH );
00213     virtual HRESULT ResetTime();
00214     virtual HRESULT Draw();
00215 };
